name: Language Tycoon Designer
description:
Wondered how to design your own programming language ? This application is just made for you !

Language Tycoon Designer is an experimental app that gives you the opportunity to design your own programming language's syntax from a list of features.

The different options provided can modify some aspects of your programming language, such as :

  • Case
  • Type location (before or after variables and functions)
  • Paradigm (OOP only for now)
  • Keywords
  • Name and type names

Programming languages can be shared to others with QR codes (QR codes requires the application), or you can generate Carbon images directly.

Note: This application doesn't create the language parser and compiler, it just generates the syntax.

Coming to Google Play Store soon !

Made with ❤️ by Cacahuète Dev
